癶字的基本解释

癶
bō
两足分张相背，行走不顺。

癶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bō］
［《廣韻》北末切，入末，幫。］
(1)汉字部首之一。
(2)两脚相背。
(3)表示两足在行走。

癶字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【癶字部】　癶； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页783第30
【唐韻】【集韻】?北末切，音鉢。【說文】足刺癶也。【六書本義】兩足張，有所撥除也。【元包經】?北癶癶。傳曰：兩人相背也。【註】北，背也。【又】漸辵之癶。傳曰：足有所行也。【註】辵，足也。癶，行也。　【字彙】从二止相背。有分癶之象。別作撥蹳，非。

暂无。

癶
Basic explanation of words
癶
bō
The two legs are separated from each other and the walking is not smooth.
癶
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bō］
["Guangyun" cut at the north end, enter the end, help. ]
(1) One of the radicals of Chinese characters.
(2) Two feet facing each other.
(3) It means that the two feet are walking.
癶
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Qi Characters] 　癶; Kangxi Strokes: 5; Page Number: Page 783 30
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? North end cut, sound bowl. [Said the text] Foot spurs are also. [The original meaning of the six books] Two feet, some set aside. [Yuan Bao Jing]? Bei Qi Qi. Chuan said: The two have turned against each other. [Note] North, back also. [Also] Gradually, the scorpion. Chuan said: There is something to do. [Note] 辵, foot also. Yeah, that's okay.　【Vocabulary】reverse from the two halves. There are signs of division. Don't make mistakes, no.
